title: After-School Hybrid Online Language Education Course: Small-Group Customized Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback and interaction enhancement through project-based assessment in a BYOD environment. Providing customized content specialized for language-related roles.

learning_goals: Participate in twice-weekly real-time language feedback sessions via small-group video conferences to improve pronunciation/expression by over 80%
Learners enhance their ability to apply practical work scenarios by completing over 90% of job-specific language tasks provided on the asynchronous learning platform.
Learners can present a portfolio reflecting at least 75% understanding of the target language culture through team-based project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
